General.Name: Verde Bio Holdings Inc
General.Description: Verde Bio Holdings, Inc. engages in the oil and gas exploration and investment business. It has mineral and royalty interests in various properties. The company was formerly known as Appiphany Technologies Holdings Corp. and changed its name to Verde Bio Holdings, Inc. in May 2020. Verde Bio Holdings, Inc. was incorporated in 2010 and is based in Frisco, Texas.
General.Address: 5750 Genesis Court, Frisco, TX, United States, 75034
